eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Bannock, ID; at 05:42 AM ON DEC 12, 2025 Effective until 07:42 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A water main break has occurred near Poleline Rd and Eldredge Rd. Water has entered a power grid area.Residents in the area must remain inside their homes as a safety precaution. Avoid the area until further notice.Updates to follow.
